message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product at a starting price of $11,500. I think it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,500 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $10,800?
